tool_name: Website Emails & Social Media Pages Link Extractor
tool_description: This API provides a list of contact emails and links to social media pages (Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and Instagram) for a specified website.

api_list.name: domain
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts any website domain name to extract emails and social media links.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain name of the website you want to extract information from.
